      • RegistrationParameters

        public RegistrationParameters()

      • RegistrationParameters

        public RegistrationParameters​(double tx,
                              double ty,
                              double theta,
                              SimilarityMeasure measure,
                              Image sensibleImage)
        Instantiates the parameters for a rigid transform.
        Parameters:
        tx - - translation on x
        ty - - translation on y
        tetha - - rotation degree
        measure - - a similarity measure to compare the images being registered

      • RegistrationParameters

        public RegistrationParameters​(double[] tx,
                              double[] ty,
                              double[] theta,
                              SimilarityMeasure measure,
                              Image sensibleImage)
        Instantiates the parameters for a rigid transform. This constructor receives lists, which are used to run the registration tx.length = ty.length = theta.length times, where the best parameter set of parameters is chosen (e.g., tx[0], ty[0], theta[0] - the best set of parameters is at index 0). The size of the measure array can be different from tx, ty and theta.
        Parameters:
        tx - - a list of translations on x
        ty - - a list of translations on y
        theta - - a list of rotation degrees
        measure - - a similarity measure to compare the images being registered

      • RegistrationParameters

        public RegistrationParameters​(double[] tx,
                              double[] ty,
                              double[] theta,
                              SimilarityMeasure[] measure,
                              Image sensibleImage)
        Instantiates the parameters for a rigid transform. This constructor receives lists, which are used to run the registration tx.length = ty.length = theta.length times, where the best parameter set of parameters is chosen (e.g., tx[0], ty[0], theta[0] - the best set of parameters is at index 0). The size of the measure array can be different from tx, ty and theta.
        Parameters:
        tx - - a list of translations on x
        ty - - a list of translations on y
        theta - - a list of rotation degrees
        measure - - a list of similarity measures to compare the images being registered

      • RegistrationParameters

        public RegistrationParameters​(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform,
                              SimilarityMeasure measure)
        Instantiates the parameters for an affine transform.
        Parameters:
        transform - - the affine transform
        measure - - a similarity measure to compare the images being registered

      • RegistrationParameters

        public RegistrationParameters​(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform[] transform,
                              SimilarityMeasure[] measure)
        Instantiates the parameters for an affine transform. The length of the measure array can be different from the transform array.
        Parameters:
        transform - - the affine transform array
        measure - - a similarity measure array to compare the images being registered
